meaningMnemonic: This word consists of kanji with hiragana attached. Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>ride</kanji> so the verb vocab version means <vocabulary>to ride</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading is kun'yomi (see that hiragana?) but that's the reading you learned with the kanji. Enjoy the ride!
